verses.text: Give ear, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Shepherd \w of|strong="H4210"\w* Israel, Thou that leadest Joseph like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* flock; Thou that sittest \add above\add* \w the|strong="H5329"\w* cherubim, shine forth.

\w Before|strong="H3427"\w* Ephraim \w and|strong="H3478"\w* Benjamin \w and|strong="H3478"\w* Manasseh, stir \w up|strong="H7462"\w* \w thy|strong="H7462"\w* \w might|strong="H3478"\w*, \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* save \w us|strong="H3478"\w*.

Turn \w us|strong="H6440"\w* \w again|strong="H3212"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God; \w And|strong="H3212"\w* cause \w thy|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* shine, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H6440"\w* saved.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H6440"\w* hosts, How \w long|strong="H6440"\w* wilt \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* angry \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* prayer \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w thy|strong="H7725"\w* people?

\w Thou|strong="H5704"\w* hast fed \w them|strong="H5704"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* bread \w of|strong="H3068"\w* tears, \w And|strong="H3068"\w* given \w them|strong="H5704"\w* tears \w to|strong="H5704"\w* drink \w in|strong="H3068"\w* large measure.

Thou makest \w us|strong="H8248"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* strife \w unto|strong="H8248"\w* \w our|strong="H8248"\w* neighbors; \w And|strong="H3899"\w* \w our|strong="H8248"\w* enemies laugh among themselves.

\w Turn|strong="H7760"\w* \w us|strong="H7760"\w* again, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H7760"\w* hosts; \w And|strong="H7760"\w* cause \w thy|strong="H7760"\w* face \w to|strong="H4066"\w* shine, \w and|strong="H7760"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* shall \w be|strong="H7760"\w* saved.

\w Thou|strong="H6440"\w* broughtest \w a|strong="H3068"\w* vine \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Egypt: \w Thou|strong="H6440"\w* didst drive \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w nations|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* plantedst \w it|strong="H7725"\w*.

Thou preparedst \add room\add* before \w it|strong="H1644"\w*, \w And|strong="H4714"\w* \w it|strong="H1644"\w* \w took|strong="H5265"\w* deep root, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* filled \w the|strong="H1644"\w* land.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* mountains \w were|strong="H6440"\w* \w covered|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* shadow \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w*, \w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* boughs \w thereof|strong="H6440"\w* \w were|strong="H6440"\w* \add like\add* cedars \w of|strong="H6440"\w* God.

\w It|strong="H3680"\w* sent out \w its|strong="H3680"\w* \w branches|strong="H6057"\w* unto \w the|strong="H3680"\w* sea, \w And|strong="H2022"\w* \w its|strong="H3680"\w* shoots unto \w the|strong="H3680"\w* River.

Why hast \w thou|strong="H5704"\w* broken \w down|strong="H7971"\w* \w its|strong="H3220"\w* walls, \w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H5704"\w* \w that|strong="H5704"\w* pass \w by|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w way|strong="H7971"\w* do pluck \w it|strong="H5704"\w*?

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* boar \w out|strong="H6555"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wood doth ravage \w it|strong="H5674"\w*, \w And|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wild beasts \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* field feed \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w it|strong="H5674"\w*.

Turn again, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* beseech thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H7704"\w* hosts: Look down \w from|strong="H7704"\w* heaven, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* behold, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* visit this vine,

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* stock \w which|strong="H6635"\w* \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* \w right|strong="H5027"\w* hand planted, \w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* branch \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w thou|strong="H7725"\w* madest strong \w for|strong="H6635"\w* thyself.

\w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* burned \w with|strong="H5921"\w* fire, \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* cut \w down|strong="H5921"\w*: \w They|strong="H5921"\w* perish \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* rebuke \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w thy|strong="H5921"\w* countenance.

Let \w thy|strong="H6440"\w* hand \w be|strong="H6440"\w* \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w thy|strong="H6440"\w* right hand, \w Upon|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* son \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* madest strong \w for|strong="H6440"\w* thyself.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w go|strong="H1961"\w* back \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w thee|strong="H3027"\w*: Quicken \w thou|strong="H3027"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* call \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H3027"\w* name.

\w Turn|strong="H5472"\w* \w us|strong="H2421"\w* again, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* hosts; \w Cause|strong="H7121"\w* \w thy|strong="H7121"\w* face \w to|strong="H7121"\w* shine, \w and|strong="H2421"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w saved|strong="H2421"\w*.
